go_data.justification: IL-7 plays a role in lymphopoiesis as shown by severe lymphopenia in IL-7 gene-deleted mice.
IL-7 induces BP-1 expression on pre-B cells and increases this population when administered to mice.
IL-7 stimulates significant growth of thymocytes in submersion cultures of intact day 14 fetal thymic lobes.
IL-7 acts as a cytokine to support B lymphopoiesis and T cell development.
